synopsis.text: San and Luna's overprotective fathers continue to pose a threat to Nagasumi's well-being as he enters his third year of school in the Seto no Hanayome OVAs. Balancing the challenges of school life and his relationships, Nagasumi finds himself surrounded by eccentric classmates and a menacing teacher named Shark, who orders the students to eliminate each other. Despite the chaos, Nagasumi cherishes his weekends, spending quality time with San at movies and maid cafes. As danger never seems to stray far from Nagasumi, he frequently finds himself rushing to save those around him, leaving San anxious about his safety. Will Nagasumi navigate through this tumultuous semester unharmed, or will the challenges prove too much for him to handle?
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
